name: Champion of the Order: Cleric 24 / Monk 6 / CoT 10
author: EasternPromises

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content:
Good afternoon all,

In my search for a guy who could have both sustain and damage. This guy came in with excellent scores across the board. His saves really set him apart, his AC on a +5 magic server is 69 and his AB is 45 with just DP. Combined with up to 10 attacks per round with darkfire and GMW you can lay on the hurt. He attains undispelability at the end and has invisibility to last until then. Just go invisible, walk next to your target, and unload.

You can get improved knockdown earlier by dropping a level of cleric, saving monk 7 for a tumble dump.

I like this guy, he's very solid, but he doesn't have anything super special. But this combo hasn't been done before and this guy can handle most every situation with ease. An excellent pick for solo play if you aren't playing Max's shadow priest.
